ygData.subject: Re: adjustments for Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lim Dul wrote:  It s not all red creatures. I m level 13 and I was in befallen yesterday. I was able to
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:

<snip example of how red creatures resist our spells>

It's not all red creatures. I'm level 13 and I was in befallen yesterday. I was
able to help with elf skeletons and ghouls with no problems, usually even doing
full damage. Dvinn is level 24 (I think) and that's 8 levels more than you. You
will always get resisted with such a high difference.

BTW, it's Emperor Crush's castle. Dvinn is an ambassador, although I don't know
of who. The Dervishes, maybe? Maybe he's Dorn's older brother?

--
Qenelin
